LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.label: AI人格コア
LanguageData.AIPersonaCore.description: 高度な人工知能を納めた、非常に進んだコンピュータコア。本体より分離されて休止状態にありますが、しかるべき所へインストールされれば驚くべき力を発揮します。
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.label: ニューロトレイナー
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.description: 使い捨てのナノテク学習デバイスで、視覚を通してナノマシーンを直接、大脳へ送り込みます。簡単にその分野のスキルを得られます。
LanguageData.MechSerumNeurotrainer.comps.1.useLabel: Use neurotrainer mech serum to learn {0}
LanguageData.MechSerumHealer.label: healer mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumHealer.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to heal health conditions. The mechanites will target and heal the single worst health condition affecting someone at any given time. Works even on health conditions that would otherwise be incurable. The mechanites can even transmute themselves into organic matter, forming new limbs or organs as needed.
LanguageData.MechSerumResurrector.label: resurrector mech serum
LanguageData.MechSerumResurrector.description: A one-use super-dose of mechanites tuned to resurrect the dead. Administered to a corpse soon after death, mechanites repair broken-down tissues and kickstart the body back to life. They are not always successful - sometimes, the resurrected will come back with brain damage, blindness, or progressive psychosis. Outcomes are better when the mechanites are administered sooner.

LanguageData.ThrumboHorn.description: スランボの角、非常に鋭く、とても貴重な為、ほとんどのマーケットで値がつきません。真の意味でのトロフィーです。
